column4: "Ana edwen dɛ obiara rinnyi wo nsɛm dodow yi ano? Na aso wɔbɛma nyimpa anobɛrbɛrnyi yi edzi bem?"

column2: "Ana wo ntuw bɛma nyimpa aka hɔn ano ato mu? Na sɛ ɔwo si atwetwe a
column3: aso nyimpa biara nnkɛhyɛ wo enyito anaa?"
Me nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛ pefee na odzi mu
column4: Na mo ho tsew wɔ Nyankopɔn n'enyiwa mu."

column3: Na oebue n'ano wɔ wo do;"
Dɛ nyansa mapa no mu dɔ yie. Dɛm ntsi hu dɛ Nyankopɔn retsea wo kakraba sen dza ɔfata w'emumuyɛ."

column2: "Ana ɔwo ibotum afa nhwehwɛmu do ehu Nyankopɔn? Anaa ɔwo ibotum ehu Otumfo no ewie pɛr?"
"Ɔkrɔn sen sor; ibotum ebɛnadze yɛ? Ɔdɔ sen samanadze; ebɛnadze na inyim?"

column5: ɔno woana na obotum esiw no kwan?"

column2: "Na ɔno na onyim nyimpa huhuw: Ohu emumuyɛ so
"Dɛ mbrɛ haban mu asoaso nnkotum adan nyimpa no
column3: Dɛmara so na nyimpa huhuw nnyim nyansa biara."
Na adan wo nsamu akyerɛ no a;"

column4: Na mma mma ɔbrakyew nntsena w'asesee mu;"

column3: ɔno na ebɛma w'enyi do dɛ nkekaa biara nnyi ho; Nyew

column2: "Na wo werɛ befir w'awerɛhow; Ebɛkaa no dɛ esu a oetwa mu kɔ:"
"Na wo nkwaber bɛhyerɛn dɛ ewiaber; Kaansa sum gye mpo a

column3: na obiara rinnyi wo hu; Na dodowara bedzi w'enyim ntotɔserɛ."

column4: Na wonnkenya kwan biara afa do eguan
column5: Na hɔn enyidado bɛyɛ dɛ ɔkra ne ngyaamu."
